name: Between Dual Worlds
description:
Between Dual Worlds is a fast-paced FPS where the goal is to survive as long as possible by defeating enemies in an arena. 

The twist? The Arena has been trapped in a multi-dimensional vortex, joining together two worlds! Travel between them through the rifts and battle it out to rack up your score.

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Credits:

Game - Baz Lever

Music -
